name: Animal Life: Dinosaurs
summary:
Explore the dinosaur continent Pangea

In ,,Animal Life - Dinosaurs" you start a fantastic voyage into the past. You'll get into the world of dinosaurs, solve tricky quests and experience exciting games.

The more you know about dinosaurs, the more the puzzles and dinosaurs you'll get to see. Collect all stars to become a real pro in the field of dinosaur research!
